name: Speed of Light (fossegutten)
description:
Working title and concept. Basically just a character controller and a map for testing.

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • Space - jump/swim up
  • Ctrl - crouch/swim down
  • Q - hookshot
  • R - restart map
  • Mousebutton Left - shoot
  • Mouse Scroll up/down - change weapons
  • Escape - Pause/settings menu.
  • F - Fullscreen toggle
